  Backyard Baseball 2007 is the fifth iteration of the best selling youth
  baseball video game of all time and the only kid&#039;s game to hold the coveted
  Major League Baseball (MLB) and Major League Baseball Players Association
  (MLBPA) licenses. Backyard Baseball 2007 features a roster full of top MLB
  pros as kids and includes all 30 MLB teams, uniforms, and logos. In
  addition, the game&#039;s kid-friendly, non-violent format, and high level of
  diversity makes it especially popular with parents. Since its launch in
  1997, the Backyard Baseball franchise has sold more than 2 million units.

  RIPPED: Intro
